name: Proh1bited Temple
description:
Proh1bited Temple is an entry for the 1bit jam of GMItalia, the Italian community of Game Maker Studio. The game is a platform with Celeste-like controls where you need to think how to get away from the temple and not only how to explore it. It has an online leaderboard for the best times.

Controls:

  • Arrow Key: movement
  • Arrow Up: interact
  • Z: jump
  • X + Arrow Key: dash
